subject: Re: Twins
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Yeah, it never bothered me much even getting cussing voices, it'just 
that fact that something talks that keeps me hooked. 

 Frank

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Marlboro63@... wrote:
>
> Hi Frank,
>  
> It is nice to see you back here again.  And I love your screen  
name.  You 
> are right when you say you can never force or coerce a spirit to  
communicate 
> with.  For those that are able to communicate with them we do  feel 
extremely 
> priviledged and honored that they have chosen to do so.   Even when 
there is no 
> communication just listening and hearing what they have to  say is 
very 
> amazing in itself.  What they say may not always be nice but  maybe 
they know more 
> about us than we give them credit for?
>  
> Jeff
>  
>  
> In a message dated 2/3/2008 11:52:08 P.M. Central Standard Time,  
> purplealiengirl@... writes:
> 
>  
>  
>  
> I made one today, same as the last except I can adjust the sweep  
level, and 
> where in the band the sweep starts, or do manual sweep. I used to  
put this 
> function in the boxes, but no one used it, too busy asking stupid  
questions, or 
> showing the world what great mediums they were cuz they had a  
box,  so I 
> started leaving it out to save parts, and front panel  space. 
> 
> I don't think you can force, or coerce spirit, I've  always thought 
it best 
> just to allow. 
> 
> Curious--these  are for me a change, and they are flying together. 
Never 
> before  have I made a board in 24 hours, it required only a slight 
shift in the  
> concept.  
> 
> Frank-S
>
